about.seoDescription: Learn more about Florian, yoga teacher and energy practitioner with certified training.
about.heroIntro: I'm Florian, a yoga teacher and energy practitioner based in Kaiserslautern. I guide people to balance through mindful movement and holistic techniques.
about.storyP1: I first discovered yoga in my early twenties and quickly realized how much it grounded and energized me.
about.storyP2: Since then I've trained with inspiring teachers across Europe and India, blending traditional wisdom with modern understanding.
about.storyP3: Today I share this practice with curiosity and compassion, helping others connect to their bodies and breath.
about.storyP4: I grew up in a highly scientific environment. As a PhD mathematician and professor of mathematics and artificial intelligence, I've always been drawn to techniques that are scientifically grounded and verified. Through yoga and Qi Gong/Tai Chi I came to energy and tuning fork work, and now I want to pass on the methods that demonstrably work to others for better self-esteem, body awareness, happiness, and health.
about.cert1Title: 200h Yoga Teacher Training – Yoga Alliance certified
about.quote: Yoga is the journey back to yourself – I am honored to guide you.
about.ctaText: I look forward to supporting you on your path.

faq.seoDescription: Frequently asked questions about our sessions and booking.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about sessions and booking.

item1.question: How do I book an appointment?
item1.answer: Click the 'Book session' button to open my online calendar. There you choose date & time and the rate (Standard, Supporter or Solidarity) and pay securely via Stripe.

item2.question: Can I book by phone?
item2.answer: Yes. Call me at … or send a WhatsApp. I manually add the appointment to the system and send you a confirmation email with an optional payment link.

item3.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
item3.answer: Online: credit/debit card, instant transfer, Apple Pay. On site: debit card or cash.

item4.question: What is your cancellation policy?
item4.answer: You can reschedule or cancel free of charge up to 24 h in advance. For later cancellations I charge 50% of the fee unless the slot can be filled.

item5.question: Does your work replace a doctor's visit?
item5.answer: No. My offerings provide energetic harmonization and do not replace medical diagnosis or therapy. Please consult a doctor first for health issues.

item6.question: Can I claim the cost of sessions with my health insurance?
item6.answer: That depends on your insurance provider. I operate on a self-pay basis, so most likely your health insurance will not reimburse the sessions.

item7.question: I don't want to book through the online calendar and Stripe. What can I do?
item7.answer: Just contact me directly and we'll find an alternative.

item8.question: Can I book an in-person session at your place or in a practice?

answer.part1: Unfortunately that's not possible right now. I'm still looking for a suitable space I can use as needed. If you rent such a room or know someone who does,
answer.linkText: feel free to contact me directly

item9.question: We'd like to book multiple sessions at our place. How does that work?

answer.part1: If you'd like to book, for example, a yoga lesson followed by an energetic balancing session, or you and one or two friends or family members want several sessions of your choice at the same location,
answer.part2: . I'll send you a suitable booking link. Of course, you only pay travel once!

item1.question: Which style of yoga do you teach?
item1.answer: A mix of Hatha, Yin, and therapeutic alignment yoga incorporating meridian knowledge by Donna Eden.

item2.question: Do I need prior experience?
item2.answer: No. I adapt each class to your level and flexibility. Absolute beginners are welcome.

item3.question: Do you offer online yoga?
item3.answer: Yes. Just choose the 'Virtual' option when booking. You'll receive a Zoom link and a checklist for camera setup.

item4.question: Can I participate while pregnant?
item4.answer: From the 13th week with medical approval. Please note the pregnancy when booking so I can adapt the practice.

item1.question: What happens during an energy balancing session?
item1.answer: After a short chat I work hands-off or with gentle touch along your meridians, chakras, and aura layers. We use meditations and visualizations, exercises from yoga and Qi Gong, and tuning fork frequencies to support your balancing process.

item2.question: Which methods do you use exactly?
item2.answer: Elements from Donna Eden Energy Medicine, Cindy Dale's 'Subtle-Energy-Blueprints', Five-Element balancing, color therapy, and tuning forks in Solfeggio and planetary frequencies.

item3.question: Will I feel anything during the session?
item3.answer: Many clients report warmth, tingling, or deep relaxation. Some briefly fall asleep – totally normal and welcome.

item4.question: How many sessions do I need?
item4.answer: Single topics often resolve in 1–3 appointments. Chronic patterns benefit from 5-session packages or monthly support.

item5.question: Are remote sessions effective?
item5.answer: Yes. Energy follows attention. Via Zoom I guide you through breathing and visualization cues while working in the energy field at the same time.

item6.question: My dog is sick. Can I book a session for him?
item6.answer: Sessions are intended for humans, but I'm happy to recommend qualified animal therapists.

testimonial.name: Happy Client

aboutTeaser.text: After years of exploring movement and energy work, I created Moving Relaxation to share energy balancing with others.

seo.title: Yoga – Moving Relaxation
seo.description: Holistic yoga practice blending yin, flow, nidra and pranayama – in private coaching or small groups.

hero.heading: Yoga – Conscious movement, deep breathing, quiet presence
hero.text: My yoga practice combines gentle relaxation, powerful flow, and mindful breath guidance into a holistic experience that harmonizes body and mind.

benefit1.title: Fascial openness
benefit1.text: Noticeably more mobility and lightness in hips, shoulders, and back.

benefit2.title: Core strength & stability
benefit2.text: Flows fortify torso and joints – daily postures become easier.

benefit3.title: Nervous system reset
benefit3.text: Breath and Yoga Nidra activate the parasympathetic; stress melts away and sleep improves.

benefit4.title: Breath capacity
benefit4.text: Greater lung volume, steady rhythm, more endurance for physical or mental tasks.

benefit5.title: Mental calm
benefit5.text: Mindful movement builds focus; thoughts settle and clarity emerges.

item1.title: Yin Yoga / Gravity Yoga
item1.text: Long, passive poses lengthen fascia and joints in the pull of gravity. You sink deep into the tissues – blockages dissolve, flexibility increases, and the mind becomes quiet.

item2.title: Hatha & Slow-Flow Vinyasa
item2.text: Clearly structured asanas meet fluid transitions. Every movement follows the breath, strengthening muscles and stability while meditative sequences turn your focus inward.

item3.title: Yoga Nidra
item3.text: Guided “yogic sleep” in savasana. You journey consciously through body layers; brainwaves drift into alpha/theta – deep restoration for nervous system and psyche.

item4.title: Pranayama
item4.text: From gentle Ujjayi whispers to calming Nadi Shodhana – targeted breath techniques regulate energy, heart rate, and mental clarity.

offer.heading: Your options
offer.subheading: Choose how you want to practice.

item1.title: Private coaching (studio or online)
item1.text: One-on-one support with body and flexibility analysis, tailored sequences, and a personal home practice plan.

item2.title: Regular group training
item2.text:
Yin & Nidra – Monday evenings, the perfect unwind after work.

Morning Slow-Flow – Thursday 7 am, jump-starts circulation and focus for the day.

Small groups (max. 8 participants) ensure personal adjustments and a familiar atmosphere.

t1.quote: The classes give me clarity and strength.
t1.name: Anna

t2.quote: I finally found a practice that fits me.
t2.name: Mark

cta.heading: Bring breath and body into harmony
cta.text: Sign up for private coaching or book your next group class – and experience yoga that truly meets you.
cta.moreText: Energy balancing realigns your energetic flows.

seo.title: Energy Balancing – Moving Relaxation
seo.description: Energy balancing gets blocked currents flowing and activates your self-healing.

hero.heading: Energy Balancing – Let your energy flow
hero.text: Energy work addresses the finely woven network of meridians, chakras, auric layers, and bioelectric fields that enliven your body and mind. Through targeted touch, holds, rhythmic tapping, conscious breathing, and gently flowing movements, blocked currents are plugged back in, strengthened, and harmonized. When useful, tuning fork vibrations sweep through tissue and biofield to dissolve tension and re-order frequency patterns. In this way, your system activates its natural self-healing abilities, stress levels drop, vitality rises—and you arrive in a state of deep presence.

intro.heading: What you'll feel
intro.text: How it shows up in daily life:

benefit1.title: Deep relaxation
benefit1.text: Your nervous system shifts into repair mode while muscles and mind let go. Breath and heartbeat slow as stress hormones drop. You feel safe, held, and deeply at ease.

benefit2.title: New vitality
benefit2.text: A fresh surge of energy replaces fatigue—stamina, creativity, and focus noticeably increase. Meridians open so qi can circulate more freely. Everyday tasks feel lighter and more empowered.

benefit3.title: Emotional balance
benefit3.text: Old emotions dissolve, giving way to ease and heart coherence. Instead of inner turbulence, you experience steadier emotional ground. Relationships and decisions unfold with more calm.

benefit4.title: Inner clarity
benefit4.text: Thoughts settle, decisions come easier, and you feel present in the here and now. Mental static fades and inner space opens. You perceive yourself and your surroundings with greater awareness.

benefit5.title: Vibrational vitality
benefit5.text: Tuning fork resonance gently awakens stagnant qi and leaves your body humming. Frequencies harmonize organs and fascia like retuning an instrument. The subtle buzz often lingers long after the session.

benefit6.title: Resonant spaciousness
benefit6.text: A sense of spaciousness spreads through your body—chest, shoulders, and hips 'open' as breath flows more freely. The tone creates room where tightness once lived. You feel more expansive and connected.

benefit7.title: Somatic release
benefit7.text: Micro-vibrations loosen fascial tissue; tension or pressure often melts away during the session. Adhesions in muscles and fascia gently unwind. Your body feels more mobile and light.

approach.heading: How I work

item1.title: Gentle holds and tapping techniques
item1.text: that align energy flows and restore balance.

item2.title: Meridian stretches and targeted movements
item2.text: that promote flow and enliven your tissues.

item3.title: Breath and mindfulness cues
item3.text: that synchronize body, mind, and energy.

item4.title: Individual chakra tuning
item4.text: to transform deep patterns and unleash creative forces.

item5.title: Tuning fork resonance
item5.text: precisely tuned forks bring your biofield back into coherence.

approach.note1: The techniques are tried and tested—gentle yet profound. You can apply them yourself after the session to keep your balance in daily life.
approach.note2: Every setting concludes with easy-to-do mini exercises so you can deepen the new balance on your own.

offer.heading: Offerings
offer.subheading: Choose the setting that suits your needs.

item1.title: Individual session (in person or online)
item1.text: Tailored analysis and balancing program for your current concern.

item2.title: Remote session
item2.text: Precise energetic alignment without leaving your space.

item3.title: Tuning fork sound therapy
item3.text: Vibration-based session that realigns tissues and frequencies through resonance.

item4.title: Chakra focus
item4.text: Targeted work on key centers when a theme needs extra attention.

t1.quote: I felt lighter and more centered.
t1.name: Lisa

cta.heading: Your path to more energy begins here.
cta.text: Book your appointment and experience relaxed presence, vibrant power, and inner clarity that transforms your day.
cta.moreText: Yoga coaching brings breath and body into harmony.
